price: "Yã Ubangijina* lalle ne Kã bã ni daga mulki, kuma Kã sanar da ni daga fassarar lãbaru. Ya Mahaliccin sammai da ƙasa! Kai ne Majiɓincĩna a dũniya da Lãhira Ka karɓi raina inã Musulmi, kuma Ka riskar da ni ga sãlihai."
arabic: ۞ رَبِّ قَدۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِي مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَنتَ وَلِيِّۦ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسۡلِمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: * Yũsufu yanã addu'a a ƙarshen rãyuwarsa, yanã neman Allah Ya cika masa da imãni.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbi qad ātaytanī mina al-mul'ki waʿallamtanī min tawīli al-aḥādīthi fāṭira al-samāwāti wal-arḍi anta waliyyī fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati tawaffanī mus'liman wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
